content.text: Write down the value of the 7 in the number 570 296
The table shows the temperature, in \(^\circ \mathrm{C}\), at midday on the first day of each month during one year in a city
Calculate the mean of these temperatures
Write these numbers in order, starting with the smallest
smallesr
On each shape draw all the lines of symmetry
Write down the order of rotational symmetry of this shape
In the triangle \(ABC\), \(AB = AC\) and angle \(BAC = 38^\circ\)
\(BCD\) is a straight line
Work out angle \(ACD\)
Diego flies from Madrid to Buenos Aires
His flight leaves at 20 55 and arrives at 03 50 local time
The local time in Buenos Aires is 5 hours behind the local time in Madrid
Work out, in hours and minutes, the time the flight takes
Diego changes 200 euros into Argentine Peso
The exchange rate is 1 euro \(= 24.8\) pesos
Work out how many pesos he receives
The distance between Madrid and Buenos Aires is 10 050 km
Diego's return flight takes 12 hours 30 minutes
Calculate the average speed, in km/h, for the return flight
Rectangle \(A\) measures \(3\mathrm{cm}\) by \(8\mathrm{cm}\)
Five rectangles congruent to \(A\) are joined to make a shape
Work out the perimeter of this shape
Find the highest odd number that is a factor of 60 and a factor of 90
Write \(\overrightarrow{PQ}\) as a column vector
Write \(3\overrightarrow{PQ}\) as a single vector
Work out the size of one interior angle of a regular 9-sided polygon
A cone has radius \(4.5 \mathrm{cm}\) and height \(10.4 \mathrm{cm}\)
Calculate, in terms of \(\pi\), the volume of the cone
[The volume, \(V,\) of a cone with radius \(r\) and height \(h\) is \(V = \frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h.\)]
The \(n\)th term of a sequence is \(60 - 8n\)
Find the largest number in this sequence
Here are the first five terms of a different sequence
Find an expression for the \(n\)th term of this sequence
Factorise completely
The diagram shows a trapezium
Work out the value of \(x\)
Simplify
Write the number 0.0605 in standard form
Calculate \((1.63 \times 10^{12}) \times (2.47 \times 10^{-1})\)
Give your answer in standard form
Expand and simplify
Write down the highest mark scored on test 1
Write down the type of correlation shown in the scatter diagram
Draw a line of best fit on the scatter diagram
Hamish scored a mark of 40 on test 1
He was absent for test 2
Use your line of best fit to find an estimate for his mark on test 2
Mrs Salaman gives her class two mathematics tests
The scatter diagram shows information about the marks each student scored
The length, \(l \text{cm}\), of a sheet of paper is \(29.7 \text{cm}\), correct to the nearest millimetre
Complete this statement about the value of \(l\)
Without using a calculator, work out \(\left(2 \frac{1}{3} - \frac{7}{8}\right) \times \frac{6}{25}\)
You must show all your working and give your answer as a fraction in its simplest form
Lucia invests $5000 at a rate of \(4.5\%\) per year compound interest
Calculate the value of her investment at the end of 7 years
Find the equation of line \(L\) in the form \(y = mx + c\)
On the grid, draw a line that is perpendicular to line \(L\)
Explain why triangle \(ABC\) is similar to triangle \(PQR\)
